docs.lead_paragraph: At a seniors’ center in Ohio, President Obama talked about a cleaning woman who had dropped her costly insurance plan, only to discover she had leukemia.

headline.seo: Obama Takes His Pitch for Health Care Overhaul to Ohio
headline.main: Obama Tries to Personalize the Health Care Bill
headline.print_headline: In Ohio, Obama Makes a Working-Class Appeal for Health Care Votes

docs.snippet: At a seniors’ center in Ohio, President Obama talked about a cleaning woman who had dropped her costly insurance plan, only to discover she had leukemia.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by David M. Herszenhorn, Robert Pear and Jeff Zeleny from Washington, and Steven Greenhouse from New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats put forward a plan, with the backing of the Obama administration, that calls for Washington to play a more active role in policing Wall Street.

headline.seo: Reform Bill From Senate Democrats Calls for More Oversight
headline.main: Reform Bill Adds Layers of Oversight
headline.print_headline: Reform Bill Adds Layers Of Oversight

byline.contributor: Cyrus Sanati contributed reporting from New York, and Edward Wyatt from Los Angeles.

docs.lead_paragraph: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi held a news conference with children's advocates at the Capitol on Monday to push for the Democrats' sweeping health care legislation.

headline.main: Pelosi: It's Not About Abortion or Immigration

docs.abstract: The House speaker on Monday sought to divert attention from issues that may divide House Democrats.
docs.snippet: The House speaker on Monday sought to divert attention from issues that may divide House Democrats.

docs.lead_paragraph: Americans United for Life, an anti-abortion group, is planning a major print advertising campaign to pressure rank-and-file House members to vote against the Democrats' big health care legislation unless it includes tighter restrictions on insurance coverage for abortions.
docs.abstract: An organization opposed to abortion rights plans to run local advertisements urging House lawmakers to vote against the Senate's version of health care legislation.
docs.snippet: An organization opposed to abortion rights plans to run local advertisements urging House lawmakers to vote against the Senate's version of health care legislation.

docs.lead_paragraph: By a vote of 21 to 16, the House Budget Committee on Monday advanced a budget reconciliation bill to the next stage of the legislative process.

headline.main: House Budget Committee Approves a Reconciliation Bill

docs.abstract: The House budget committee on Monday advanced a budget reconciliation bill that as yet contains no language related to health care.
docs.snippet: The House budget committee on Monday advanced a budget reconciliation bill that as yet contains no language related to health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: It has been easy for the last year and a half to blame the difficult small-business environment on the financial crisis and the slow recovery. A big rebound does not seem in sight for most businesses, at least not in the near future. After looking at my business and speaking to other small-business owners, I have come to the conclusion that the problem is not just the economy but also some profound changes that have been progressing for years.
docs.abstract: I have come to the conclusion that the problem is also some profound changes that have been progressing for years.
docs.snippet: I have come to the conclusion that the problem is also some profound changes that have been progressing for years.

docs.lead_paragraph: A loose coalition of political fund-raisers have been reminding Democratic congressmen, many of them freshmen and still undecided over health care legislation, just what's at stake in the battle - including, perhaps, their re-elections.

headline.main: Fund-Raisers Push Wavering Democrats on Health Care

docs.abstract: Democratic fund-raisers turn up the heat on members of Congress who are undecided on health care.
docs.snippet: Democratic fund-raisers turn up the heat on members of Congress who are undecided on health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: Just about every year, a large contingent of motorcyclists leaves their normal haunts, like Skylonda, and roars into Sacramento to protest the state law requiring them to wear helmets.

headline.main: California May Require Helmets for Young Skiers

docs.abstract: A Bay Area state senator has drafted legislation mandating that parents of skiers and snowboarders under the age of 18 be responsible for ensuring that their children wear helmets.
docs.snippet: A Bay Area state senator has drafted legislation mandating that parents of skiers and snowboarders under the age of 18 be responsible for ensuring that their children wear helmets.

docs.lead_paragraph: For the Obama administration, the next several days are all about the "aye's."

headline.main: The Early Word: Counting the Votes

docs.abstract: As the House moves toward another round on health care, the pressure is on for keeping votes in line.
docs.snippet: As the House moves toward another round on health care, the pressure is on for keeping votes in line.
